code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{runPerformanceTest,runFunctionalityTest,runSecurityTest}from"../api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TestForm=()=>{const[url,setUrl]=useState("");const[component,setComponent]=useState("");const[endpoint,setEndpoint]=useState("");const[message,setMessage]=useState("");const handlePerformanceTest=async()=>{try{const response=await runPerformanceTest(url);setMessage(response.data.message);}catch(error){setMessage("Error running performance test");}};const handleFunctionalityTest=async()=>{try{const response=await runFunctionalityTest(component);setMessage(response.data.message);}catch(error){setMessage("Error running functionality test");}};const handleSecurityTest=async()=>{try{const response=await runSecurityTest(endpoint);setMessage(response.data.message);}catch(error){setMessage("Error running security test");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"AI Testing Platform"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Performance Test"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Enter URL",value:url,onChange:e=>setUrl(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handlePerformanceTest,children:"Run Test"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Functionality Test"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Component (e.g., login)",value:component,onChange:e=>setComponent(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleFunctionalityTest,children:"Run Test"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Security Test"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"API Endpoint (e.g., /api/login)",value:endpoint,onChange:e=>setEndpoint(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSecurityTest,children:"Run Test"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:message})]});};export default TestForm;
